message: I am now prepare master degree in adoption of agile in EGYPT  and need help from people who work on it  , to make case studies , PLZ Help

data.message: انا محتاج حد شغال بية فى مصر
Mostafa Elhabbal

Guys, I think what he is looking for is software developers (preferably seniors / leads) who are happy for him to interview them (not sure written interview or in person) about their experience applying agile in reality. He came to me asking and I thought our group sure has some people that can offer that help. Thanks.
بالبلدي حد في مصر دلوقتي مطبقين الـ Agile في شركته و مستعد يساعد أحمد سمير بإنه يتكلم معاه عن ازاي طبقوه و الدنيا كانت ماشية ازاي من الأول للأخر؟ يقول له يا ريت مشكورا.
ايوا بالظبط كده عاوز اخد تجارب عملية لتطبيق agile فى مصر
I think Fatma Moawad

Yes, dr Fatma used to teach agile by practice in the GUC as part of the Software Engineering course :)
Each tutorial group was like a company with a scrum master (the TA) and split into teams with team leaders, and she evaluated everything after every sprint :)
Ask Mouneer Rabie , he will have plenty :)
Can one of the admins please approve his membership? I added him to the group.
Mosab Ahmad no pending membership at the moment :)
He got approved, maybe another admin beat you to it :D

thanks Mosab Ahmad for referencing me .
I'll more than happy to help.

i be aback in Cairo by nov 12th isa.

I'll contact you by then ahmed
فين الناس الجامدة اللي في مصر يا جماعة؟ ده أنا قلت له خش الجروب و مش هتلاحق ع الناس. محدش شغال Agile في مصر و لا إيه؟ عيب عليكم يعني :P

Ahmed Samir  are you targeting the agile specification or the adoption in the business world...  

Few years ago we have been exploring different forms of Agile. and then we build own customized version of the Scum process. basically it is scrum with some additional guidelines to cope with business needs.

I think this sort of customisations is exactly what he would like to know. What you followed by the book and worked, and what you didn't follow and why, and what you followed and failed, and what you added to it (the customisation). This sounds like a great example. Allow Ahmed to contact you about it please.

Who else? I'm sure everyone is using their own form of agile/scrum/kanban/whatever guys. Just be kind enough and consider talking to the guy about it (I'm not affiliated BTW, but I expected more people :D)
That is great mahmoud i will contact you to get the story
Mohamed Meligy  shaklak affiliated :)
Thanks Mohamed Meligy for you help ☺

Exactly. That's why I stated I'm not, because I know I look like I am ;)
Not any more than the fact that I recommended this group to him when he asked me for people to contact

But consider me affiliated w e7'demoony feeh ya3ny no problem :D
w aho bokra ab2a affiliated/not-affiliated l 7ad menkom bardo :)
ElMohanned Ahmed

Hey. I am certified ScrumMaster from USA since 2009 and consulted a lot of companies and my current startup Wasalny and previous ones all implemented Scrum.

Would love to help.
Thanks guys  for your help and appreciated, really as Mohamed Meligy told me , you will find what you want here in this group ☺
